title: stash.ai
desc: An intelligent, cross-device bookmarking tool that uses machine learning to automatically analyze and organize links that you save. Various activities.

title: inxite discoverer
desc: Created an interal tool to assist in mapping heathcare databases to each other using statistical heuristics and machine learning.

title: cultural quotient
desc: Created a prototype application of GRIN, a lossy compression scheme for bathymetry and other geospatial data.

title: national hemophilia foundation
desc: Served as a non-voting member to the Board of Directors and as a Consultant to the Technology Committee. Lobbied to senators and house representatives in D.C. in regards to the ACA and medicaid.

title: mochilla adventures
desc: A travel company to encourage young travelers and help them share their stories and experiences. Various activities.

title: karisma
desc: An annual student-run non-profit charity arts showcase in NYC that raises money to support education in the Himalayan region. Designed logo, website and served as stage director.

title: invisible the film
desc: A documentary about living with chronic illness and fighting insurance and drug companies for access to treatment. Created an interactive page to highlight actors and their stories.

title: community recycling campaign
desc: Founded a 501(c) public charity to refurbish and donate used computers and electronics to charities. Recognized by the President's EPA Environmental Award and as a TIE International Student Innovator.

title: iphemap
desc: A searchable database of neuronal disease phenotypes from induced pluripotent stem cells providing a field overview from 79+ curated reports. Designed and implemented a website and backend for Dr. Jaime Imitola.

title: uhtceare.co
desc: A collaborative blog about travel, music, and daydreams.
